input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Item keywords:
Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures
Comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards
input_text.Response A: Wayne 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump - SWS50-12P. Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is a durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth. The SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump is a conventional tank system with a 12 gallon horizontal tank. The pump is a 1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump with a maximum flow rate of 420 gallons per hour at 50 psi. The pump is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. The pump is designed for wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth. The pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation. The motor is a dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V). The discharge is 3/4 in. Npt with a 1-1/4 in. suction.
input_text.Response B: Monsuno 40 Surge Edition is a new game where you collect Monsuno cores, transform them into action figures, and battle each other. Each Core comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure, and 3 collector game cards. Collect all 40 Surge Edition Monsuno cores to build your Monsuno army and battle it out with your friends.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
